plugins.name: doc-enforcer
plugins.description: PostToolUse hook that tracks code vs doc file edits and reminds when documentation may need updating

plugins.name: forced-eval
plugins.description: Force explicit evaluation of Skills, MCP Tools, and Agents before implementation (84% activation rate)

plugins.name: notifications
plugins.description: Push notifications via ntfy.sh for Claude events

plugins.name: research-workflow
plugins.description: Research workflow for ML/data science: hypotheses, experiments, findings, paper reading

plugins.name: session-persistence
plugins.description: Persist session state across Claude sessions — saves what you were working on and reports it on next start

plugins.name: skill-use-logger
plugins.description: Logs skill invocations to .claude/skill-use-log.jsonl for analytics

plugins.name: strategic-compact
plugins.description: Strategic context compaction suggestions at logical intervals — suggests /compact after threshold tool calls, logs compaction events

plugins.name: coding-tutor
plugins.description: Personalized coding tutorials that use your actual codebase for examples with spaced repetition quizzes

plugins.name: compound-engineering
plugins.description: AI-powered development tools. 28 agents, 24 commands, 15 skills, 1 MCP server for code review, research, design, and workflow automation.

plugins.name: homunculus
plugins.description: A Claude Code plugin that's alive. Observes everything, learns instincts, evolves capabilities. Bound to one maker.
